item.title: I am featured in Ö1 Radiokolleg on ''Maschinenmusik'', which is broadcasted next week
item.description:
Next week, Ö1 Radiokolleg (by the Austrian public broadcaster ORF) devotes to the topic of music and algorithms, and their impact on the music industry. The program is called Maschinenmusik.
I am among the experts interviewed for this program which is broadcasted throughout the week. I will appear in part 2 (Tuesday) and 4 (Thursday).
